main event: A sighting of an unidentified flying object occurred on 7 February 1956, described as being similar to a star and very high in the sky.
interesting points: The object was observed using ground radar and visually through binoculars.,The sighting lasted thirty seconds before the object faded over the horizon.,The object was detected moving from north to south.,Radar reports indicated the sighting, but it was not confirmed by the Miami International Airport control tower.,The object was described as shiny, silver, and similar in shape and size to a blimp.
sighted object: Unidentified flying object resembling a blimp
